events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me well and the material feels different from the description.
The issue was classified as a refund request based on the customer’s mention of wanting their money back due to fit and quality concerns.
An agent from the returns team has been assigned to handle this refund request to provide proper assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket did not meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed to verify return eligibility?
Sure, my order number is 4578329. The jacket has only been tried on but not worn outside or washed yet.

Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly and once we receive the jacket we will process your refund within 3 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support throughout the process.
We are closing the case now as your refund has been successfully completed and you have no further questions.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our customer service regarding your refund request.
